title: Phases
description: Jake moved from the big city to teach creative writing in a small town. He loves the town, the job and the people, especially his new friend George Johnson. When George's wife dies he has to ask Jake for a big favor. In doing so he has to share an even bigger secret. This secret will not only stretch the imagination but will test a friendship to its limit. What is it about the moon anyway?
author: P.S. Winn
